meanings.definition: Made up of various parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The composite picture showed different animals combined together.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was a result of their composite skills and efforts.
meanings.sent3: The composite cake had layers of different flavors, making it a unique treat.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was a composite of colors that blended harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The composite nature of the forest included various trees, plants, and animals.

meanings.definition: A material made up of two or more different substances
meanings.sent1: The composite used in construction was strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The tennis racket was made of a composite of graphite and fiberglass.
meanings.sent3: The chef experimented with a composite of spices to create a new flavor.
meanings.sent4: The artist sculpted a beautiful statue using a composite of marble and bronze.
meanings.sent5: The composite material was lightweight yet sturdy, perfect for aerospace applications.

meanings.definition: A photograph made by combining several separate images
meanings.sent1: The photographer created a stunning composite of the city skyline at night.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover featured a composite of the celebrities at the event.
meanings.sent3: The composite image of the family reunion made everyone look like they were all together.
meanings.sent4: The detective used a composite of the suspect's features to create a sketch.
meanings.sent5: The composite photo captured different moments in time, blending them seamlessly.
